valid: For the period 06:00 (UTC) on Wed 27 Aug 2025 to 06:00 (UTC) on Thu 28 Aug 2025
general_synopsis: Low 250 miles west of Bailey 971 expected just west of Rockall 987 by midnight tonight. Low Rockall 991 moving slowly north losing its identity by same time. High Norwegian Sea 1013, slow-moving with little change
